apple_vendor_description: The right-facing fist emoji, presented with a medium skin tone on Apple devices, is rendered with a distinct sense of power and solidarity. Its form is sculpted with Apple‚Äôs characteristic glossy 3D shading, highlighting the knuckles and the firm clench of the hand, all softened by rounded edges. This emoji is a versatile gesture on Apple devices, often used to convey agreement, support, a high-five, or a strong sense of encouragement.
